Sizes
Medium, small and extra small variants are available.
Designing compact actions
Icon buttons establish common functionality in small spaces. The icons you choose
must be related to an easily recognisable Ul paradigm in your product. Other areas of
the application should use buttons with icons paired with a text label for the action to
help establish what the icons mean.

Placing icon buttons
Icon buttons are typically placed inline horizontally following any full-size button, when
paired as a secondary action.

communicate hierarchy only amongst a group of similar kinds of buttons.

Button order
Keep the button order consistent - we recommend that horizontally aligned icon button
groups have a trailing primary button.
Icon button group
Primary buttons are positioned at the end of an icon button
group.

Icons for extra small buttons
Only use extra small icon variants from Skapa's library on extra small sized buttons.
These icons have been designed to be used for legibility at these extra small sizes, while
retaining the natural 24px icon size. Icons that have these variants will also contain
"Medium" or "Small" in their icon name.
